title: Easyclean Antibacterial Biodegradable Disinfectant Wipes,5 Pack of 80 (400 Wipes) Citrus Zest & Lemon Fragrance, Effective Mould Mildew Remover, Ideal For Home Cleaning & Multi-Surface Use
features: POWERFUL 10X CLEANING ACTION – Effectively removes tough dirt, burnt-on food, kitchen grease, and bathroom grime, delivering a deep clean with every wipe.
KILLS 99.9% OF BACTERIA & VIRUSES – Provides protection against MRSA, E. coli, Salmonella, Rotavirus, and Flu virus, ensuring a hygienic home.
BIODEGRADABLE & ECO-FRIENDLY – Made from 100% plant-based fibres from responsibly managed sources, breaking down in just 15 days in active landfill conditions.
FRESH, LONG-LASTING FRAGRANCE – Enjoy a refreshing burst of Citrus Zest, Lemon & Lime, or Zesty Ginger & Grapefruit, leaving your home smelling clean and uplifting.

CONVENIENT & RESEALABLE PACKAGING – Airtight, resealable pack keeps wipes moist and ready for use, perfect for quick clean-ups at home or on the go. Remove the wipe from the packaging and use it for a single surface cleaning. Leave it on for at least 5 minutes to achieve effectiveness.
Keep out of reach of children.

First aid: In case of contact with eyes, immediately rinse eyes with running water, open eyelids; remove contact lenses if present. In case of inhalation of vapors, provide fresh air. If swallowed, do not induce vomiting and seek medical attention.
description: Product description Experience powerful 10X cleaning action with these biodegradable antibacterial wipes , designed to tackle tough dirt, burnt-on food, kitchen grease, and bathroom grime with ease. Kills 99.9% of bacteria and viruses , including MRSA, E. coli, Salmonella, and Flu virus (H1N1), ensuring a hygienic and germ-free home. Made from 100% plant-based fibres , these eco-friendly wipes break down in just 15 days in active landfill conditions, making them a sustainable choice for everyday cleaning. Infused with long-lasting, fresh fragrances like Citrus Zest, Lemon & Lime, and Zesty Ginger & Grapefruit , they leave your home smelling clean and revitalized. The airtight, resealable packaging keeps wipes moist and ready for use, making them perfect for both household cleaning and quick touch-ups on the go. Safe for multiple surfaces, including kitchen counters, sinks, hobs, and bins, these wipes provide a fast, convenient, and effective cleaning solution for every home. Ingredients wipes
